001package org.biopax.validator;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005public interface XrefUtils {
006  /**
007   * Removes tail spaces and converts to upper case
008   *
009   * @param name original name
010   * @return normalized name
011   */
012  String dbName(String name);
013
014  /**
015   * Gets database name and its variants.
016   * The first in the list is the recommended one.
017   *
018   * @param name case insensitive
019   * @return set of equivalent database names
020   */
021  List<String> getSynonymsForDbName(String name);
022
023  /**
024   * Gets the primary name for the DB.
025   * It returns NULL for "unknown" database name.
026   *
027   * @param name case insensitive name (of a bio ID type/resource) name
028   * @return preferred name
029   */
030  String getPrimaryDbName(String name);
031
032  /**
033   * Checks whether the ID format is valid for the database.
034   * Always use {@link #canCheckIdFormatIn(String)} before this method,
035   * because it may throw an exception if you do not.
036   *
037   * @param db case insensitive
038   * @param id
039   * @return 'false' if matcher fails, 'true' otherwise
040   * @throws NullPointerException when no pattern available
041   */
042  boolean checkIdFormat(String db, String id);
043
044  /**
045   * @param name a database name (used in xrefs), case insensitive
046   * @return true if it's possible to check the format.
047   */
048  boolean canCheckIdFormatIn(String name);
049
050  /**
051   * Gets the regular expression corresponding
052   * to the database.
053   *
054   * @param db a database name, case insensitive
055   * @return regular expression to check its ID
056   */
057  String getRegexpString(String db);
058
059  /**
060   * Checks whether the db name is known (configured)
061   * misspellings or unofficial name,
062   * which the Validator can recognize, report
063   * warning, and replace with official names; and which
064   * otherwise, using MI or Miriam, cannot be resolved.
065   *
066   * @param db case insensitive
067   * @return true or false
068   */
069  boolean isUnofficialOrMisspelledDbName(String db);
070
071
072
073  /**
074   * Test that different groups/clasters of db synonyms do not overlap.
075   * @return
076   */
077  boolean xcheck();
078}
